org.mini2Dx.core.controller.deadzone

Class AxialDeadZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.deadzone.AxialDeadZone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeadZone

    public class AxialDeadZone
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeadZone
    Implements an axis-based dead zone - suitable for tile-based games. See Doing Thumbstick Dead Zones Right.
